Literature.Title: Synthetic cationic amphiphilic ?-helical peptides as antimicrobial agents.
Literature.Author: Wiradharma N, Khoe U, Hauser CA, Seow SV, Zhang S, Yang YY

Literature.Title: Rationally designed ?-helical broad-spectrum antimicrobial peptides with idealized facial amphiphilicity.
Literature.Author: Wiradharma N, Sng MY, Khan M, Ong ZY, Yang YY

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>500 µg/ml,Rat erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12222(MIC=63µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29737(MIC=>500µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=63µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>500µg/ml)
